summary: When a family moves to a country home, the young girls experience strange happenings that have a link to an occult event years past.
cast: Bette Davis|Lynn-Holly Johnson|Kyle Richards|Carroll Baker|David McCallum|Benedict Taylor|Frances Cuka|Richard Pasco|Ian Bannen|Katharine Levy|Eleanor Summerfield|Georgina Hale|Ina Clare|Dominic Guard|Derek Lyons
title: Los ojos del bosque
